title: The Mandarin Oriental New York takes local activities to the next level, from courtside Knicks seats to private museum tours
text:
From out-of-hours private tours of the world’s top museums to jetting off in helicopters to meet archaeologists in ancient ruins – a new collaboration between Ambercrombie & Kent and Mandarin Oriental is pulling out all the stops.

Philip, my ‘Guggenheim educator’, has wound his way round the spiralling galleries of the Guggenheim in New York a dizzying number of times. But still, he says, every visit feels different and at every turn the building reveals something new.

The place is predictably packed on the afternoon we visit, and though Philip likes the buzz of all those people – he describes the character of the building as “animated, dynamic and kinetic” – I’m here getting a taster of the...
